headerDisplay:
All devices associated with the configured Daikin account will be loaded as accessories.
You must have a Daikin One+ Smart Thermostat and Daikin cloud account for this plugin to work.
footerDisplay: See the [homebridge-daikin-oneplus](https://github.com/jeffschubert/homebridge-daikin-oneplus) developer page for detailed documentation, and to submit feature requests and bug reports.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Enables debug level logging. Defaults to false.

includeDeviceName.title: Include Device Name
includeDeviceName.description: Include device name as part of the default sensor name.

ignoreThermostat.title: Ignore Thermostat(s)
ignoreThermostat.description: Do not load thermostats found in Daikin account.

ignoreOutdoorTemp.title: Ignore Outdoor Temperature
ignoreOutdoorTemp.description: Do not load outdoor temperature data of thermostats found in Daikin account.

ignoreIndoorAqi.title: Ignore Indoor Air Quality Sensor(s)
ignoreIndoorAqi.description: Do not load indoor air quality sensors of thermostats found in Daikin account.

ignoreOutdoorAqi.title: Ignore Outdoor Air Quality Sensor(s)
ignoreOutdoorAqi.description: Do not load outdoor air quality sensors of thermostats found in Daikin account.

ignoreIndoorHumSensor.title: Ignore Indoor Humidity Sensor(s)
ignoreIndoorHumSensor.description: Do not load indoor humidity sensors of thermostats found in Daikin account.

ignoreOutdoorHumSensor.title: Ignore Outdoor Humidity Sensor(s)
ignoreOutdoorHumSensor.description: Do not load outdoor humidity sensors of thermostats found in Daikin account.

enableScheduleSwitch.title: Enable Schedule Switch
enableScheduleSwitch.description: Enable switch to get/set the Schedule state of thermostats found in Daikin account.

enableAwaySwitch.title: Enable Away Switch
enableAwaySwitch.description: Enable switch to get/set the Away state of thermostats found in Daikin account.

enableEmergencyHeatSwitch.title: Enable Emergency Heat Switch
enableEmergencyHeatSwitch.description: Enable switch to request auxiliary/emergency heat only

enableOneCleanFan.title: Enable One Clean Fan
enableOneCleanFan.description: Enable fan that allows the user to run one clean.

enableCirculateAirFan.title: Enable Circulate Air Fan
enableCirculateAirFan.description: Enable fan that allows the user to run the fan constantly at the specified speed.

autoResumeSchedule.title: Enable Schedule after Away
autoResumeSchedule.description: When the Away switch is toggled off, automatically enable the schedule.

logRaw.title: Device Data Logging
logRaw.description:
Enables logging of raw device data from Daikin API. Debug logging must also be enabled. Defaults to false.
WARNING: May include sensitive or identifying information. Review before sharing. Will also significantly increase log size.

layout.title: Sensor Setup
layout.description: Specify whether specific sensors should not be loaded on start up.

layout.title: Optional Accessories
layout.description: Extra accessories to control specific aspects of the thermostat.
